sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {productAdded} from '../cart/cartSlice' import {IncrementedButton} from './IncrementButton' import {DecrementedButton} from './DecrementButton' import {LikeButton} from './LikeButton' export const SingleProductPage = ({match}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const productId = match.params.productId const product = useSelector(state => state.products.products.find( product => product.id === productId )) useEffect() const cartItem = useSelector(state => state.cart.cart.products.find( product => product.id === productId )) const onAddCartClicked = () => { if (!cartItem) { dispatch( productAdded({ ...product, cartQty: 1, cartTotal: product.price }) )} } return (
{product.type}

{product.name}

${product.price}

{product.description}

{cartItem? cartItem.cartQty:0}

) }
